cab.content: From:- General Delme Radoliffe, Italy. To:- C.I.G.S., War Office.Handed in at 1.30 a.m.. 30.11.17. Received at 5 a.m. 30.11.17.10002. Novr. 29th. Evening situation report.Nothing of importance to report on any part of the front.Enemy artillery vras fairly active on Mt. Fior Tondarecar,and Mt. Spil, Considerable concentration of enemy forcesnear Boffat is reported. Five enemy and two Italian aeroplanes.were crashed.
